name: Dinogeddon Dress Up
description:
Invent and dress up your own dino-ridin' girl! Based on the funky comic, Dinogeddon, this fashion game gives you high customization over your character. Choose a hairstyle, hair colours, facial features, even the size of her body! Choose from rough and ready clothes and dress up for the post-apocalyptic wasteland.

- 3 body sizes
- custom hair, face and colours
- complex and original wardrobe
- dinotastic backgrounds
- weapons

Have fun =D
